definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: prob. exalt, honour (As. zabâlu COT:Gloss and id. on Ge 30:20, 1Ki 8:13, cf. Dl:Pr 62 f. so De; Ph. n.pr.f. [[בעלאזבל]] (prob. = Baal has exalted) cf. [[אִיזֶבֶל]] p. 33 supr.; cf. Ar. zabala take up and carry; > Nö:ZMG 1886, 729, who connects these vbs. with Syr. sbal bear, carry, cf. Heb. [[סָבַל]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִזְבְּלֵנִי אִישִׁי]] Ge 30:20 b (J), my husband will honour me (in expl. of name Zebulun (v. infr.); on another appar. expl. in v:a cf. [[זבד]]); > AV al. dwell with me, cf. Thes RobGes who derive dwell with fr. an assumed mng. be round (cf. [[דור]]); and others (cf. MV:8. 9), who derive dwell as denom. from [[זְבֻל]] in sense dwelling.
